title: Video: Avec Sans – Hold On
body: Returning with their first original material in seven months, UK duo **Avec Sans** (featuring 1/3 of [Run Toto Run](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/4246-interview-run-toto-run/)) are showing no signs of letting up. Another indie-disco floorfiller in waiting, _Hold On_ isn’t quite the UK’s answer to Purity Ring like I originally predicted, and wanders a far more pop-orientated path, however there’s few electronic acts around at the moment writing with such confidence and ambition.
